question: Darood Shareef for the purpose of marriage
answer:
QUESTION
Assalamu Alaikum Mufti Saheb 1) Please let me know of a Darood which is not very lengthy and is beneficial for me to recite 500 times for marriage because I have a very busy schedule and I would like to recite the Darood Shareef with complete concentration and without rushing through it. Please tell me a durood in your reply JAZAKALLAH. 2) Are men allowed to show elbows in namaz prayer (ie. wearing a t-shirt)? Jazakallah Khair May Allah accept and reward you for your good deeds.
ANSWER


Share:
1) The shortest Durood is, 'Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam'. This may be read
500 times.
2) It is Makrooh for men to expose their elbows in Salaat.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Moulana Imraan Vawda
for: FATWA DEPT.
